content.rendered:
Directed by Saket Chaudhary.

Written by Saket Chaudhary. Amitosh Nagpal. Zeenat Lakhani.

Cast Irrfan Khan(Raj Batra). Saba Qamar(Mita Batra). Dishita Sehgal(Pia Batra). Deepak Dobriyal(Shyam Prakash). Swati Das(Tulsi – Shyam’s Wife). Amrita Singh(Principal Lodha). Sumit Gulati(Chhotu). Angshuman Nandi(Mohan – Shyam’s Son). Neha Dhupia(Aarti Suri). Tillotama Shome(Admission Consultant). Rajiv Gupta(Masterji – Raj’s Father). Rajesh Sharma(MLA). Sanjana Sanghi(Young Meeta). Delzad Hiwale(Young Raj). Kiran Khoje(Sushila – Raj’s Maid). Neelu Kohli(Mita’s Mother). Anurag Arora(Hindi Teacher / Admission Inspector). S.K. Batra(Government School Principal). Mallika Dua(Dolly). Kulbir Badesron(Dolly’s Mother (as Kulbir Kaur)). Sanjay Suri(Kabir Suri). Pammi Khanna(Suraj Valley High School Principal). Shyam Gopal(Crossroad International School Principal). Angad Dev Dogra(DJ). Vijay Kumar Dogra(MLA’s PA). Arha Mahajan(Aarya – Consultant Office Girl). Parth Dhamija(Parth – Consultant Office Boy). Charu Shankar(Maya). Sahani(Maya’s Husband). Danny Sura(George – English Expert). Taran Bajaj(Prince – The Tout). Govind Pandey(Factory Supervisor). Narendra Nagar(Principal’s PA #1). Arora(Principal’s PA #2). Anup Trivedi(Bharat Nagar Ration Shopkeeper). Radha Sheetal(Bharat Nagar Waterline Woman). Sachin Kumar(Chandani Chowk Neighbour #1).

Language Hindi.

Producers Sanjay Bector. Sharada Karki. Kushagra Kulshrestha. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Sandeep Leyzell. Ashok Shetty. Dinesh Vijan.

Production Maddock Films.
